column4: I am trying to install Gizmo the sipphone/im client . I really don't understand what you do ? Most program it is clear what the tar is and the deb . I don't understand if those are the things it need or What . here is the download page http://gizmo5.com/pc/download/linux/?PHPSESSID=452f103d4219ca41b052609d164a0009
Well, I feel dumb . I thought they where lib and not the program itself . thanks pvh_sa|wrk
Most program are just named  program_name_version.deb and nothing else .
a .deb file is just another archive, you can have something very useful in something like foo.deb :)
